ol.li: SHALL conform to Derived CDA Section
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="67665?0" EMS Scene (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] title = "EMS Scene"

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] eMSFirstUnitIndicatorRelationship
This eMSFirstUnitIndicatorRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="67665?0" EMS reporter is first unit on scene (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type BL

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] eMSFirstUnitOnSceneRelationship
This eMSFirstUnitOnSceneRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="67481?2" Name of first unit on scene (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type ST

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] eMSScenePatientCountRelationship
This eMSScenePatientCountRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="67489?5" EMS Count of patients at scene (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type INT

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] eMSMassCasualtyIndicatorRelationship
This eMSMassCasualtyIndicatorRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type BL
